input: What can you say about American Football? Is i talso considered a popular sport as soccer?
gold_answer: American Football is the most popular spectator sport in the United States by several measures. It has a large following and attracts significant television audiences.  The National Football League ( NFL ) has the highest average attendance of any sports league in the world , and the Super Bowl is watched by millions globally.  American Football is also played and viewed in other countries. For instance, American football has a long history in Mexico , which was introduced to the sport in 1896 . It  was the second-most popular sport in Mexico in the 1950s , with the game being particularly popular in colleges . The Los Angeles Times notes that the NFL claims over 16 million fans in Mexico , which places the country third behind the US and Canada. The game has a significant following in Canada according to a 2013 poll , 21 % of respondents said they followed the NFL very closely '' or fairly closely '' , making it the third-most followed league behind the National Hockey League ( NHL ) and Canadian Football League ( CFL ). The sport is played in European countries as well, such as Switzerland , which has American football clubs in every major city , and Germany . But in those countries American football has not yet reached the same level of popularity it has in North America.

retrieved_contexts.text:
Major League Soccer All-Star Game
Major League Soccer 's first all - star game was played at Giants Stadium in the summer of 1996 . The game , using the traditional East -- West format with players handpicked by the coaching staffs , was the first game of a doubleheader with the Brazilian national team defeating a team of FIFA World All - Stars . The matchup between divisions would only be used for six seasons as MLS tried experimenting with different formats . The 1998 All - Star Game placed a team of American MLS players against MLS players from abroad . The 2002 game , the first to use a league - wide all - star team , is the only game to feature a national team opponent . Since then ( except in 2004 ) , every opponent has been a professional club invited by the league . The MLS All - Stars won their first six games before falling to Everton in penalties in 2009 . All games since 2005 have been against teams from Europe , the majority of which have been from England 's Premier League . This is a feasible format because unlike MLS ( which runs a spring - summer - fall schedule ) the major European leagues all run a fall - winter - spring schedule , meaning the middle of the MLS season coincides with the pre-seasons of most European leagues . From a European perspective , the match is considered to be a pre-season friendly against an MLS XI .
retrieved_contexts.title: Major League Soccer All-Star Game

|user|: how does the mls all star game work?
|assistant|: The MLS All-Star Game is an annual soccer game where selected players from Major League Soccer (MLS) compete against an international club. The format of the game has evolved over the years. Initially, it featured the Eastern Conference playing against the Western Conference. However, since 2005, MLS has been inviting a professional club from abroad to participate. The opponents are usually from Europe, specifically England's Premier League, due to the scheduling coincidence of the MLS midseason with the pre-seasons of most European leagues. Players earn roster spots through a combination of fan voting and selections by the appointed manager and league commissioner. The game is considered a pre-season friendly from a European perspective.

The game , using the traditional East -- West format with players handpicked by the coaching staffs , was the first game of a doubleheader with the Brazilian national team defeating a team of FIFA World All - Stars . In 2012, the game was played in PPL Park, Chester,Pennsylvania ; in 2013 the Sporting Park , Kansas City hosted the game and in 2015, the Major League Soccer All-Star Game was played in the Dicks's Sporting Goods Park, in Commerce City Colorado.                         The first MLS All-Star Game was played at Giants Stadium in the summer of 1996.
|user|: MSL All-Star game seems to be a big sport event.  Have any teams from Europe played in the MSL All-Star Games ?
|assistant|: Yes. Several teams from Europe have participated in the MLS All-Star Games. The 2002 game featured the U.S. national team as the opponent, but since then, every opponent has been a professional club invited by the league. Teams from England's Premier League have made up the majority of these opponents like the Manchester United . For instance, the 2009 game saw Everton as the opponent, while Tottenham Hotspur participated in the 2015 game. The 2007 game featured Celtic from Scotland; Roma was invited to be opponent in 2013; Bayern Munich in 2014; Real Madrid participated in the 2017 All-Star Game . Those are some Europeans teams that had played int the MLS ALL-Star Games .
|user|: Talking about soccer, Can you name the best soccer players of all the time?

In 2002 , ESPN described Zidane as the greatest player in the world in the world 's biggest game . In 2004 , he was voted UEFA Best European Player of the Past 50 Years , and was named in the FIFA 100 list of the world 's greatest living players . Cristiano Ronaldo is also considered one the best player of the world. Sports journalists believe  that he is the best player in modern football, widely regarded as one of the greatest of all time . He has scored more than 600 senior career goals for club and country . Lionel Messi is also one of the best soccer player to ever play the game .Pelé is considered the  best soccer player of the last century.
|user|: What  does it make a good soccer player?
|assistant|: A good soccer player typically needs to possess a combination of various skills like passing , tackling , evasion of tackles , catching and kicking   and talent. It is important that they are lean and muscular with a reasonably high level of capacity in all areas of physical performance. A good height is also considered advantageous somewhat as can determine the position that they play as for forwards who aim to score with their heads  ; however , people of all heights have an equal opportunity to excel professionally at the sport .A study of the greatest male players in history showed that the distribution of heights approximated the average man.
|user|: Are Soccer still considered the most watched sports around the world?
|assistant|: Yes, soccer, also known as football in many parts of the world, is still considered the most popular and most-watched sport globally played by over 250 million players in over 200 nations , and has the highest television audience in sport , making it  definitely the most popular in the world.  The World Cup is also the  most widely viewed and followed sporting event in the world . The cumulative viewership of all matches of the 2006 World Cup is estimated to be 26.29 billion . 715.1 million individuals watched the final match of this tournament ( a ninth of the entire population of the planet ) . retrieved_contexts.text:
American football
In Canada , the game has a significant following -- according to a 2013 poll , 21 % of respondents said they followed the NFL `` very closely '' or `` fairly closely '' , making it the third-most followed league behind the National Hockey League ( NHL ) and Canadian Football League ( CFL ) . American football also has a long history in Mexico , which was introduced to the sport in 1896 . American football was the second-most popular sport in Mexico in the 1950s , with the game being particularly popular in colleges . The Los Angeles Times notes that the NFL claims over 16 million fans in Mexico , which places the country third behind the US and Canada . American football is played in Mexico both professionally and as part of the college sports system . The top American football competition in Mexico is the recently created Liga de Fútbol Americano Profesional ( Professional American Football League ) . At the collegiate level there is the Liga Mayor of the ONEFA , a college championship founded in 1930 . There is also the CONADEIP Premier Conference , another college competition founded in 2010 . American football is the fifth most popular sport in Mexico and the country has the highest rating of the NFL outside the United States . Opening

retrieved_contexts.text:
American football
The sport is played in European countries such as Switzerland , which has American football clubs in every major city , and Germany , where the sport has around 45,000 registered amateur players . In Europe , almost all nations have their own leagues , highlighting its importance those of Austria ( Austrian Football League ) , Germany ( German Football League ) , Great Britain ( BAFA National Leagues ) , France ( Ligue Élite de Football Américain ) and Italy ( Italian Football League ) . But in these countries American football has not yet reached the same level of popularity it has , for example , in North America . There are national teams of Austria , Finland , France , Germany , Great Britain , Hungary , Israel , Italy , Netherlands , Poland , Romania , Russia , Serbia , Spain and Sweden .

retrieved_contexts.text:
United States
American football is by several measures the most popular spectator sport ; the National Football League ( NFL ) has the highest average attendance of any sports league in the world , and the Super Bowl is watched by millions globally . Baseball has been regarded as the U.S. national sport since the late 19th century , with Major League Baseball ( MLB ) being the top league . Basketball and ice hockey are the country 's next two leading professional team sports , with the top leagues being the National Basketball Association ( NBA ) and the National Hockey League ( NHL ) . These four major sports , when played professionally , each occupy a season at different but overlapping , times of the year . College football and basketball attract large audiences . In soccer , the country hosted the 1994 FIFA World Cup , the men 's national soccer team qualified for ten World Cups and the women 's team has won the FIFA Women 's World Cup three times ; Major League Soccer is the sport 's highest league in the United States ( featuring 19 American and 3 Canadian teams ) . The market for professional sports in the United States is roughly $69 billion , roughly 50 % larger than that of all of Europe , the Middle East , and Africa combined . The
retrieved_contexts.title: United States

retrieved_contexts.text:
American football
American football , referred to as football in the United States and Canada and also known as gridiron , is a team sport played by two teams of eleven players on a rectangular field with goalposts at each end . The offense , which is the team controlling the oval - shaped football , attempts to advance down the field by running with or passing the ball , while the defense , which is the team without control of the ball , aims to stop the offense 's advance and aims to take control of the ball for themselves . The offense must advance at least ten yards in four downs , or plays , and otherwise they turn over the football to the defense ; if the offense succeeds in advancing ten yards or more , they are given a new set of four downs . Points are primarily scored by advancing the ball into the opposing team 's end zone for a touchdown or kicking the ball through the opponent 's goalposts for a field goal . The team with the most points at the end of a game wins .
retrieved_contexts.title: American football

retrieved_contexts.text:
American football
What is considered to be the first American football game was played on November 6 , 1869 between Rutgers and Princeton , two college teams . The game was played between two teams of 25 players each and used a round ball that could not be picked up or carried . It could , however , be kicked or batted with the feet , hands , head or sides , with the ultimate goal being to advance it into the opponent 's goal . Rutgers won the game 6 goals to 4 . Collegiate play continued for several years in which matches were played using the rules of the host school . Representatives of Yale , Columbia , Princeton and Rutgers met on October 19 , 1873 to create a standard set of rules for all schools to adhere to . Teams were set at 20 players each , and fields of 400 by 250 feet ( 122 m × 76 m ) were specified . Harvard abstained from the conference , as they favored a rugby - style game that allowed running with the ball .
retrieved_contexts.title: American football
